Interface ec.trace.TraceErrorWatcher

public interface TraceErrorWatcher
The interface for any object that wishes to be informed when a program error has been logged. To register, the caller should call:

TraceController.errorWatcher(this, true);

To stop being informed, call:

TraceController.errorWatcher(this, false);

notifyFatal()
Notify a user that a fatal error has happened.
notifyOptional()
If the user wants to hear about nonfatal bugs, notify her.

notifyFatal 
 public abstract void notifyFatal()
Notify a user that a fatal error has happened. Tell her how to report the bug. Does not return.

notifyOptional 
 public abstract void notifyOptional()
If the user wants to hear about nonfatal bugs, notify her. Does return.
